name: Bunny (ethanmil)
description:
*No sound*

Move the bunny with WASD. Move the bees with your mouse. Protect the bunny for as long as you can. The bees will deter the poachers.

Created with Ebitengine in Golang

Assets:

- Bunny sprites: https://seethingswarm.itch.io/bunnypack

- Tiles: https://pixymoon.itch.io/cute-rpg-world

- Poachers: https://rgsdev.itch.io/animated-soldiers-characters-pack-for-2d-sidrescroller-pl...
